mapper.select: SELECT o.orderno, o.custid,o.orderdate,o.orderpay,o.itemcnt,o.elevator,o.shipname,o.shipaddr,o.reciever,o.recievertel,i.itemname AS item_name, i.itemprice*o.itemcnt AS total_price FROM detailorder d INNER JOIN item i ON i.itemno=d.itemno INNER JOIN orderpage o ON o.orderno = d.orderno WHERE o.orderno=#{orderno}
